how_to_get_discount.title: How to Request Discount

step1.title: Contact Us First
step1.description: BEFORE buying tickets, contact us to verify if discount is available

step2.title: Check Availability
step2.description: We check with official box office if discounted seats are available

step3.title: Confirm and Book
step3.description: If confirmed, book the apartment and we proceed with discounted purchase

how_it_works.title: ⚠️ IMPORTANT - Mandatory Procedure:
how_it_works.contact_first: 1. Contact us BEFORE any purchase via WhatsApp (+39 320 49 33 807) or email
how_it_works.specify_event: 2. Specify concert, date and desired sector
how_it_works.verify_availability: 3. We verify discount availability with official Auditorium box office
how_it_works.confirm_booking: 4. Only if confirmed, proceed with apartment booking + ticket purchase
how_it_works.no_guarantee: Discount is NOT guaranteed and depends on availability at official box office
